entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update src/Security/samples/CustomPolicyProvider sample from .NET 2, to .NET 9 #61462
  • Perf improvement: https, json #61459
  • Declarative state persistence base case failure #61456
  • WebApplication.CreateBuilder() is getting stuck randomly. #61450
  • Forwarded Headers Middleware: X-Forwarded-Prefix Applied when it comes from an Unknown Proxy #61449
  • Perf regression: kestrel-encoded-url, tls-handshakes-kestrel #61446
  • Perf regression: json, kestrel-encoded-url, tls-handshakes-kestrel #61445
  • Perf improvement: single_query, single_query #61444
  • Worried about comment and directon of aspnet mvc vs blazor #61443
  • RazorSourceGenerator fails with net10.0 Preview 3 #61439

Closed

  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server - `Method not found: 'Void Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation.set_Tags` on .NET 10 preview 3 #61460
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61415
  • Update src/Security/samples/CustomPolicyProvider sample from .NET 2, to .NET 9 #61461
  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` broken on `10.0.0-preview.2.25164.1` and `10.0.0-preview.3.25172.1` - readonly properties and missing 'Reference' definition #61457
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json_middleware, kestrel-header-symbols #61420
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-header-symbols #61430

PullRequests

Created

  • Add IOpenApiDocumentProvider interface and implementation #61463
    area-mvc, area-minimal
  • Use NormalizeDirectory consistently in SiteExtensions D.B.P #61455
    area-networking
  • Enable getting IJSObjectReference to a JS function in Blazor interop #61453
    area-blazor
  • [main] (deps): Bump dotnet/arcade from 0c0caeb605f7b2b99408bfa6b18b13526d747727 to e80f44b15b3050d868dc8fb58d0fa514ca8c7451 #61452
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `52204f7` to `e90fe24` #61451
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Add preload placeholder to blazorwasm template #61448
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview4

Merged

  • Quarantine: Copy_MultipleSegments #61294
    area-middleware, 10.0-preview4
  • Remove unnecessary newline at the end of the webapiaot csproj #61302
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview4
  • Quarantine `EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnNavigation` failing tests #61427
    test-failure, area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • Increase Grpc InteropTests timeout again, and quarantine EmptyUnary #61433
    area-grpc, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • feat: fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • `HttpNavigationManager` no longer uses `NavigationException` #61306
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Fix for Kestrel's ParseHeaders throwing ArgumentOutOfRange exception #61316
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve exception message when EF.Function is evaluated on the client. #35940
  • Cosmos/FTS: remove hard-coded fallback to default language for the TFS property if none was specified explicitly #35939
    10.0.0
  • Bad core generation on `ef migrations add lc` #35938

PullRequests

Created

  • Correct Relationsjips -> Relationships #35941

Updated

  • Add model building support for complex type collections #35905

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom font does not apply to RemoteViews in ongoing notification #28946
  • Add Focus propagation to MauiView #28945
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android, 9.0.60] Enabling LLVM on Android crashes the app at start #28939
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [TabbedPage] PopToRootAsync displaying wrong page #28933
    Backlog
  • Incorrect label LineBreakMode in IOS inside CarouselView #28930
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Windows Foreground threads not working as expected #28929
    Backlog
  • [REGRESSION, 9.0.60 Android] Many labels are of wrong size #28928
    .NET 9 SR6

Closed

  • Adding GestureRecognizer To Editor prevents focus on Android & iOS #27831
    Backlog
  • AccessViolationException in CarouselView on dynamic Shell navigation on Windows #27925
  • GetManifestResourceStream doesn't work when project name is different than RootNamespace #28569
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `maui/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #28112
  • SearchBar.Focused / Unfocused Events Not Triggered on Windows (MAUI 9) #28927
  • Font size changes after focus when using contenteditable body in MAUI WebView on iOS #28848
    Backlog
  • Your app used deprecated APIs or parameters for edge to edge. #28926

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android]Fix: Swapping out the content of a RefreshView breaks on Android #28944
    community ✨
  • Add a prompt for triage #28943
  • [ci] Produce nightly for inflight/current #28940
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Header/Footer Feature #28938
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28937
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #28936
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fixed the OnPlatform does not work for header property in Collection view #28935
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Controls Disappear When WebView is Used with Hardware Acceleration Disabled #28934
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed BarTextColor applied to secondary toolbar items #28932
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Compute LayoutConstraints on new *StackLayout and Grid #28931
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR7

Merged

  • [XC] add IRootObjectProvider #28310
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fix for the File.ContentType from MediaPicker not being in valid MIME format #28842
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, essentials-file-picker, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Fixed the Incorrect Text Color Applied to Selected Tab in TabbedPage #28844
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix FlyoutPage does not respond to changes in the FlyoutLayoutBehavior property #28884
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Fixed ScalingCanvas.SetBlur not working #28911
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix PaddingWithoutSafeArea #28919
    community ✨, testing-flakiness
  • [ai] Add release notes prompt #28896
  • [iOS] - Resolved Proper Rendering of Dynamic Header/Footer Updates in CV2 #28641
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed the TargetInvocationException Occurs When Selecting Header/Footer After Changing ItemsLayout in CV2 #28890
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7

Updated

  • [2025/04/11] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28867
    p/0, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fixing #28912 by only hiding context buttons when user already stopped dragging the cell #28914
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/04/07] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #28661
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Picker - focus/unfocus events #28122
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Support XmlnsDefinitionAttribute in "this" assembly #28090
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Fix for IndicatorView using templated icons not working #28905
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fixed NavigationStack not updating when OnAppearing is invoked #28666
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Stop iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation by looking at VisualElement computed Constraint #28479
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [X] Protect some xmlns #28909
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements #28119
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Shell - Propagate BackButtonBehaviorProperty #28615
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] Fixed issue where group Header/Footer template was applied to all items when IsGrouped was true for an ObservableCollection #28886
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed KeepLastItemInView for CV1 and added support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28885
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: consider reporting EditAndContinueErrorCode.DocumentIsOutOfSyncWithDebuggee warning if project doesn't specify SingleTargetBuildForStartupProjects property #78125
  • Custom BannedSymbols file name and extension #78124
  • OverrideCompletionProvider error in Razor files #78119
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.UnitTests.Semantics.BinaryOperators.Test1 and Test5 are failing #78117
  • Visual Studio is adding unnecessary space between curly braces. #78115
  • Enable "build task" source generators via `RegisterImplementationSourceOutput` #78108
  • Compile collection expressions to using ImmutableArray when targeting read-only interfaces #78106

Closed

  • API for IgnoredDirectiveTrivia #77697

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/dev17.14] Disable failing Test1 and Test5 lines #78127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge 2.72.27 into release/vscode to prepare patch #78126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Cache MEF catalog in servicehub process #78122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Testing bit prints on all platforms #78120
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix razor analyzer loading #78116
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge 'main' into UserDefinedCompoundAssignment #78113
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Cleanup how code is executed in our unit tests #78112
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement CRef binding for compound assignment operators #78111
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Fix issue #70183: adjust the plural for expression collection #78110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Use Extension as data type for Extension Message Handlers errors and remove DocumentLinePosition #78121
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Disable failing Test1 and Test5 lines #78118
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Support consumption of instance compound assignment operators #78087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Update ignored directives public API #77968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives, Next

Updated

  • Fix VB tests on MacOSX #78024
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delete unused test hook #78105
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Project system cleanups #78104
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update targets to reduce syntax tree recreations due to ParseOption changes #78093
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Generate documentation - update API shape #78067
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace construction to background thread #78051
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, breaking-change
  • Implement custom awaitable support #78071
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Runtime Async, Next
  • Update `RuntimeHelpers.Await` rules #77957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Extensions: nullability analysis for invocations and method groups #78080
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GCStress=3 has gotten very slow on osx-arm64 #114581
    10.0.0
  • The Android logging support has broken a diagnostics exception handling test #114579
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'varTypeIsUnsigned(srcLoadType) || (genTypeSize(srcLoadType) >= genTypeSize(castType))' #114573
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Debug/Release generate different results #114572
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Debug: Throws 'System.NullReferenceException', Release: Runs successfully #114571
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' #114570
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'markedLastLoop && markedCurrLoop' #114569
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Interlocked.Or/And for enums #114568
  • Remove `ymm` embedded rounding code in JIT and AVX10 APIs #114566
    10.0.0
  • Tune conditional compare optimizations for APX #114564
  • Add remaining APX NCI instructions to emitter #114563
  • Optimize and tune APX NDD form codegen #114562
  • Tune LSRA with APX EGPR #114561
  • Enable and optimize LSRA with APX push2/pop2 #114560
  • Enable EGPR for `GenTree` nodes that lower to promoted VEX/EVEX encoding. #114559
  • XDocument.LoadAsync doesn't respect Cancellation token #114555
  • [mono][wasm][linux] Algorithm 'Aes' is not supported on this platform #114552
  • Updating to .Net Framework / .Net Core 8 from .Net Framework .Net Core 6 seems to come with performance penalties #114551
  • SerialPort 读取数据被分片的问题 麻烦看清楚在关我的issues #114547
  • ILC error in BenchmarkDotNet #114544
  • TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones() doesn't support localized display names #114543
    Future
  • error NU1004: The package reference Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks version has changed from [8.0.14, ) to [8.0.15, ). #114536
  • [API Proposal]: `ProviderAliasAttribute`: Better move to `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions` #114532
    Future
  • [browser] hot reload tests deadlock on linux #114526
    Future

Closed

  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 48 Regressions on 2/27/2024 9:28:58 PM #99315
    10.0.0
  • InstrumentAdvice<T> doesn't show up for .NETStandard 2.0/2.1 class library #114553
  • CLR_DOTNET_RID is not set #114538
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: JIT/opt/Devirtualization/Comparer_get_Default/Comparer_get_Default on OSX ARM64 #109395
  • MetadataUpdateHandler not working in custom host #113452
    Future
  • SerialPort 读取数据被分片的问题 #114539
  • StackOverFlowException no longer breaks into the debugger on F5, instead the app hangs #114412
    10.0.0
  • Test failure in RunReflectionScenario_UnsafeRead #113553
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: change 'Unsafe.AsPointer' parameter to be 'ref readonly' #114189
    10.0.0
  • Is `InlineArray16<T>` intentionally excluded? #114514
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/throwbox/filter/filter.dll #113815
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Micro optimizations to improve the performance of EH stackwalking, particularly in the X86 with Funclets model #114582
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add an IsFuncletCache to the EECodeInfo #114580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Prevent DynamicOptimization test from running with DOTNET_ForceRelocs=1 #114578
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable AVX2 optimistically with AVX on NAOT #114575
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ML-KEM: Fix checking encapsulation key size #114574
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • ILLink : Test API expsure #114567
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Make sure we add the System.Private.* assemblies when using the NativeAOT runtime pack as the runtime package. #114556
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][coreclr] Make libs subset build #114548
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Added missing clearing of pooled arrays #114545
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add a type for call emission parameters #114542
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix verify_free_list #114540
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add breaking change rule for adding partial modifier to interface methods #114537
    area-Meta
  • Increase timeout on fuzzing deployment pipeline #114535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Define which assets to preload #114534
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Again adjust for culture name normalization in AssemblyNameInfoFuzzer #114531
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [clr-interp] Add support for virtual method calls #114529
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [H/3] Clean up and fix Alt-Svc handling #114528
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Handle DelayFree for HW_Category_SIMDByIndexedElement intrinsics #114525
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Add native library network support #114523
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Haiku: Add native library IO support #114521
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, os-haiku

Merged

  • Disable JIT/opt/Devirtualization/Comparer_get_Default on osx-arm64 #114554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Add minipal_getexepath implementation #114519
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Use NOTIFY_ON_U2M_TRANSITIONS in SfiInit/SfiNext #114496
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Define `libroot.so` as the `libc` #114522
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114391
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.5
  • Only remove publishing workload manifests in the runtime join job #114558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #114498
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Use the regular build scripts for -vs coreclr.sln #114511
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ignore CLR_DOTNET_RID when using stub cdac #114541
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Move DAC signing identity to PME #114032
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging][mono][hotreload]Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #114119
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 9.0.5
  • Use regex to match version in MicroBuild workaround #114549
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][interp] Avoid doing extra lookups when not needed #114517
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Haiku: Fix context register name #114518
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Haiku: Fix IPC socket #114520
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Remove setting `$ORIGIN/netcoredeps` rpath #114512
    area-Host
  • Don't publish all workload manifest packages, not just the msi ones #114527
    needs-area-label
  • Fix issue when logging stack overflow in WinForm apps. #114432
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Force storing GC state until we see a labeled IG #114475
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove useless argument from RedirectForThrowControl #114444
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.NETCore.CoreDisTools nuget package from 1.4 to 1.5 #114507
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use 'ref readonly' in 'Unsafe.AsPointer' #114406
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add `InlineArray16<T>` #114515
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Support W3C Propagator #114583
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0
  • Split up loader heap implementations #114246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Print load immediate value in disassembly #114470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Zip async implementation #114421
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0][wasm][interpreter] Fix PackedSimd interpreter intrinsics #114218
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add internal intrinsics for instance-based calli #114495
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2685315 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Add support to add new FieldRVAs to EnC #114463
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • SLH-DSA implementation for OpenSSL #114060
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbb #114150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [DRAFT] Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • HTTP/3: Eliminate near-zero "wait for connection" telemetry signals #114083
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Draft : Reduce TP regression in allocateRegistersMinimal() #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Move lower 12 bits of indirection address to load / store offset #114488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fix loop recognition bug in .NET 8 #114457
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.16
  • Learn what's failing about the OSSL tests on new mac queues #114163
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109648
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging][wasm] remove problematic default settings #112216
    area-Workloads, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112992
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.16
  • [release/8.0-staging] [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114078
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109646
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bump System.Text.Json toolset version #113385
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Moved a static field initialization from Thread to ProcessorIdCache #114273
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114077
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix ordering issue in interface trimming #114509
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Optimize `BigInteger.Multiply` by Toom-Cook multiplication #112876
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix IsVNConstantBound assert #114486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Simplifying the loop generated in genZeroInitFrameUsingBlockInit and jump encoding #114003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • MLDsaOpenSsl + tests #114485
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • disable/trim MetricsHandler when System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter.IsSupported is false #114326
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Remove a few more instances of unsafe code in STJ #114490
    area-System.Text.Json, reduce-unsafe
  • [BLOCKED] System.CommandLine update #111864
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Console, blocked
  • Replace OptimizedInboxTextEncoder vectorization with SearchValues #114494
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web, reduce-unsafe, 10.0.0
  • [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate MacCatalyst and iOS/tvOS simulator jobs to `osx.14.arm64.open` and `osx.15.amd64.open` queues #113313
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Add pattern matching for SVE intrinsics that operate on mask operands #114438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Reduce string interpolation overhead #114497
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [browser] msbuild leaks tesing #114258
    area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • JIT: Shrink data section for const vector loads #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `WasmFingerprintDotnetJs` tests and add `OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders` tests #112859
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use `Stream.ReadAtLeast` when loading ZipArchives #114256
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Send host tests to helix #114187
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [coreclr][android] Don't build/ship unused GC variants for Android #114448
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • Optimize Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory #111050
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Place read-only non-GC static bases into read-only section #114477
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify handling `Span` in the cctor interpreter #114487
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `Zba` extension instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generated .deps.json for a resolved package should use path relative to published app layout instead of NuGet package layout #48406
  • [10.0-preview.3] NuGetAuditMode=direct flagging transient vulnerabilities #48391
  • [dotnet test for MTP - Retry] Consider only re-tried test nodes when subtracting failures #48369
    10.0.1xx

Closed

  • `dotnet sln migrate` should take over `.slnLaunch` as `.slnxLaunch` #48014
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #48124
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47650
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47641
  • Add support for tool@version to tool install commands #48155
  • could't run dotnet sdk using proot #26650

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48409
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce specific test executions times #48405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR vs MSFT signing comparison #48404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SDK-PR-guide.md to include servicing changes to upstream repos #48403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • package-add: Use PackageIdentityArgument #48402
    untriaged
  • Remove the TestSdkRpm #48400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add /t:CompareCliSnapshots and /t:UpdateCliSnapshots #48396
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.4.25210.1 #48395
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for `dotnet file.cs` (without explicit `run` subcommand) #48387
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow sdk binary in the VMR #48382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.2xx #48265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #48267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #48268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sign check to remove the exclusions but only check on sign… #48275
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.105 April 2025 Updates #48274
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop copying PSB reference packages #48397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add synchronize event trigger to pr-analysis.yml #48398
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool install/update: Support package@version syntax #48085
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #47904
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove scenario-tests from Version.Details.xml #48394
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use pull_request_target event for GH Actions workflows #48390
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest.10.0.100-Transport package #48388
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename DISABLE_CROSSGEN #48389
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.1xx #48266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48356
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48365
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #48367
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove dead code in UsageReport #48359
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not build SDK installers in source-build #48322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48329
    untriaged

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #48269
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to spliting our test work items by method instead of class. #44898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Support OfficialBuildId for SB #48327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • --interactive should actually default to true in user-facing situations. #48353
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Move in-vertical manifest merging to new arcade package #47881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Skip second build if possible with 'dotnet run file' #48318
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Switch to using `darc vmr forwardflow` #48351
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • [StaticWebAssets] Rename WriteImportMapToHtml to OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders #48312
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimize compression #47734
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Promote `NuGet.Client` builds during official CI #48311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
